Amazingly fun game, probably the most toxic community around though.

Acho um jogo ótimo, um dos melhores, o único defeito que vejo é uma plataforma como a steam ter muitos xiters, isso diminui a experiência do jogo limpo e legal, espero que isso realmente melhore dentro do jogo.

This game has been out for over a decade, and Valve still for some reason thinks it is a good idea to match extremely low-ranked players with high-ranked players. Seriously, no one enjoys, or gets anything out of games where the skill level is so different that players on the same team cannot cooperate with each other. Varying between the ranks a little bit is totally fine, but silvers should NOT be put in games with MG's and up. And the fact that Valve doesn't realize this shows how little they pay attention to their community.

Save yourself the headache and DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME. It will only frustrate you because of how incoherent the matchmaking system is.
